paper_keywords: Hilbert function of a local ring
paper_abstract: In this article, we give a constructive method to form infinitely many families of monomial curves in affine 4-space with corresponding Gorenstein local rings in embedding dimension 4 supporting Rossi's conjecture. Starting with any monomial curve in affine 2-space, we obtain large families of Gorenstein local rings with embedding dimension 4, having non-decreasing Hilbert functions, although their associated graded rings are not Cohen-Macaulay. paper_title: Monomial curve families supporting Rossi's conjecture
